summary: SINCE THE DRUMS ON THE TRAILER WEREN'T COMPATIBLE FOR ELECTRIC BRAKES, THE CONSUMER CONTINUED TO HAVE PROBLEMS WITH THE BRAKES FOR YEARS.  *PH  EVERYTIME THE CONSUMER REPLACED THE MAGNETS AND OR BRAKES DEXTER INFORMED HIM THAT THEY ONLY MANUFACTURED ON DRUM FOR HIS VEHICLE'S AXLE.  OVER THE YEARS THE CONSUMER HAS REPLACED THE CONTROLLERS, GROUND WIRES, TRAILER CONNECTORS YET THE BRAKES CONTINUED TO PERFORM POORLY.  *NM
